com.bmwcarit.barefoot.markov

Class KState<C extends StateCandidate<C,T,S>,T extends StateTransition,S extends Sample>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bmwcarit.barefoot.markov.StateMemory<C,T,S>
      • com.bmwcarit.barefoot.markov.KState<C,T,S>
  • Type Parameters:
    C - Candidate inherits from StateCandidate.
    T - Transition inherits from StateTransition.
    S - Sample inherits from Sample.

    public class KState<C extends StateCandidate<C,T,S>,T extends StateTransition,S extends Sample>
extends StateMemory<C,T,S>
    k-State data structure for organizing state memory in HMM inference.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      KState()
      Creates empty KState object with default parameters, i.e.
      KState(int k, long t)
      Creates an empty KState object and sets κ and τ parameters.
      KState(org.json.JSONObject json, Factory<C,T,S> factory)
      Creates a KState object from a JSON representation.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      C estimate()
      Gets a state estimate which is the most likely state candidate of the last update, with respect to state candidate's filter probability (see StateCandidate.filtprob()).
      boolean isEmpty()
      Indicates if the state is empty.

      Sample object of the most recent update.

      Gets the sequence of measurements z0, z1, ..., zt.

      Gets the most likely sequence of state candidates s0, s1, ..., st.

      Updates the state with a state vector which is a set of StateCandidate objects with its respective measurement, i.e.
      Set<C> vector()
      Gets state vector of the last update.

    • Constructor Detail

      • KState

        public KState()
        Creates empty KState object with default parameters, i.e. capacity is unbounded.

      • KState

        public KState(org.json.JSONObject json,
              Factory<C,T,S> factory)
       throws org.json.JSONException
        Creates a KState object from a JSON representation.
        Parameters:
        json - JSON representation of a KState object.
        factory - Factory for creation of state candidates and transitions.
        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException - thrown on JSON extraction or parsing error.

      • KState

        public KState(int k,
              long t)
        Creates an empty KState object and sets κ and τ parameters.
        Parameters:
        k - κ parameter bounds the length of the state sequence to at most κ+1 states, if κ ≥ 0.
        t - τ parameter bounds length of the state sequence to contain only states for the past τ milliseconds.
